name: SectoidsRuleHumanity
description:
Hippie guitarist figure out that the world is really ruled by sectoids and decides to avenge them for their own failures.

Use WASD, Spase (in run) for jump and mouse for control your's avatar. 

If you want exit - use shift + f4

"Лютая хтонь" team.

Musiс, Game disigne - Gomer1594

All the rest - Hoseccan

_________

Used Mixamo for animation. Also couple of sound effect and textures 

were taken from side.
